bibl.title: A Companion to Ancient Egypt. (Blackwell Companions to the Ancient World.) Volume I; - Volume II.
bibl.seg: Alan B. Lloyd (ed.), A Companion to Ancient Egypt. Volume I; - Volume II = Blackwell Companions to the Ancient World.
Malden, MA - Oxford, Blackwell, 2010, 8°, xlvi-1276 pp., tabl., figg., cartes. ISBN 978-1-4051-5598-4. £250.

C.R. par Peter C. Nadig, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2011/2011-10-29.html >. - A. Coyette, LEC 79 (2011) pp. 388-390. - Agnieszka Wojciechowska, Eos 98 (2011) pp. 111-113. - James K. Hoffmeier, BASOR 369 (May 2013) pp. 252-254.
